series: Revue des Nouvelles Technologies de l'Information
title: SArEM: Un méta-modèle pour la spécification des processus d'extraction d'architectures logicielles
abstract: We propose a meta-model, called SArEM, that specifies the basic elements of the softwarearchitecture extraction. SArEM serves as a tool to compare the different software architectureextraction approaches that aim to extract a system architecture from the source code.
authors: Mira Abboud, Hala Naja, Mourad Oussalah, Mohamad Dbouk
